title: Ticket #5710: Bosco file transfer broken by bad sinful string, part two
description:
The previous fix to rewriting of the sinful string for file transfers tunneled over ssh for Bosco was incomplete (#5704). It only covered input sandbox transfers, and left output sandbox transfers broken.

We're also back-porting the fix from 8.5 to 8.4, because an 8.4 gridmanager may have to work with an 8.5 ft-gahp.
remarks:
2016-Jun-07 09:30:19 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: I approve this change.
check_ins:
2016-Jun-13 10:59   Check-in [48538]: Version history for Bosco file transfer fix. (By Jaime Frey )
2016-Jun-06 16:44   Check-in [48502]: Fix rewriting of gridmanager sinful for ft-gahp, part two. #5710 The previous change only fixed input transfers. Now, we also fix output transfers. (By Jaime Frey )
2016-Jun-06 16:30   Check-in [48501]: Fix rewriting of gridmanager sinful for ft-gahp. #5704 #5710 In 8.5, the initial ip:port of a sinful string is ignored; only the addrs field is used for contacting the daemon. So we need to improve how the gridmanager rewrites its sinful string when sending it to the ft-gahp so as to use the ssh tunnel. [...] (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
